item.title: Dark Mode Hidden
item.description: The dark mode setting for “Depend on time” is gone, but still there. Thanks to: https://www.androidpolice.com/2019/03/13/android-q-beta-doesnt-have-a-dark-mode-toggle-so-turn-it-off-or-on-before-upgrading/ ðŸŽ‰ If you want to enable dark mode, enter: adb shell settings put secure ui_night_mode 2 If you want to disable dark mode, enter: adb shell settings put secure ui_night_mode 1 If you want to set it to auto, enter: adb shell settings put secure ui_night_mode 0
